Articles.Content: Due the recent release of the FALCON-42AR. Lonewolf productions saw this as a challenge due to the statement made by Forty-Two Industries ...[but then problems came across. So many parts... we are talking about a total of 28 fully-loaded (four rounds each) railguns, 32 bombs, and 16 missiles]. We wanted to see if it could be done a smaller platform then the 42AR with just as many railgun ,bombs and rockets. Currently the HP-21(WOLF BANE) is to have all of the armament of the AR42 on a smaller platform. Currently it has 15 railguns with 6 rounds a piece (90 rounds of fun). It fires these guns in a volley of 15 rounds.
